snippet.title: Earthbound Music: Battle Edition
snippet.description:
See also:
Earthbound Music: Town Edition http://youtube.com/watch?v=hSZhcvtHGK0
Best VGM 76 - http://youtube.com/watch?v=grQkblTqSMs
Best VGM 165 - http://youtube.com/watch?v=KiGfjOLF_j0
Best VGM 234 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=a_WurTZJrpE&fmt=18
Best VGM 288 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6kIE2xVJdTc&fmt=18
Best VGM 318 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKfLOMirwho&fmt=18
Best VGM 401 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=37rVPijCrCA&fmt=18
Best VGM 484 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gW0DiDKWgWc
Best VGM 573 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2WYI83Cx9Ko
Best VGM 670 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GC99a8VRsIw
Best VGM 774 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3rxfNjBGqQ
Best VGM 830 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_j8AXugAZCQ
Best VGM 910 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mPhy1ylhj7E
Best VGM 1000 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jaG1I-7dYvY
Best VGM 1112 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_3Am7OPTsSk
Best VGM 1244 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t6YVE2kp8gs
Best VGM 1389 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8EaxiB6Yt5g
Best VGM 1449 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4gMnPkOQe8
Best VGM 1651 - http://youtu.be/aKqYLGaG_E4
Best VGM 1770 - http://youtu.be/Iss6CCi3zNk
Best VGM 1797 - http://youtu.be/I0FNN-t4pRU
Best VGM 1994 - https://youtu.be/a4t1ty8U9qw
Best VGM 2158 - https://youtu.be/NtXv9yFZI_Y
Best VGM 2401 - https://youtu.be/Mk6n1Acqv_c

Earthbound's probably my favorite game of all time with Chrono Trigger. Its soundtrack is amazing, so here's some of the battle music.
I had a 10 minutes limit so some of them are missing, the ones I thought weren't worth adding.
Also, I know the battle vs Giygas isn't there, that's because I'll make a video for that one alone.

The enemies shown were supposed to reflect the music, but I couldn't find all the art (credits to starmen.net!) I wanted, so I did put some random monsters in there as well. Especially that last one, man I love that monster. So sexy.

Track list in order:
Otherworldly Foe (Battle 10)
Battle against a Mobile Opponent (Battle 03)
Battle against a Weak Opponent (Battle 06)
The New Age Retro Hippie (Battle 05)
Battle against a Weird Opponent (Battle 01)
Battle against a Machine Opponent (Battle 02)
Kraken of the Sea (Battle 09)
Sanctuary Battle (Battle 08)
